outputs.output_descr: The Programme was designed to complement the capacity building efforts of the ECOWAS Small Arms Control Programme (ECOSAP) through targeted training for personnel of the various National Commissions for Small Arms in the 15 ECOWAS member states and their partners.

project_descr: Promoting Dialogue and Strengthening Operational Level Competence for Security Sector Practitioners in the Sahel Region
project_title: Promoting Dialogue and Strengthening Operational Level
